Package dontlookback

Class BasicMonster

java.lang.Object
dontlookback.BasicMonster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Enemy, Monster, NPC
public class BasicMonster extends Object implements Monster
Basic Monster Implementation A concrete implementation of the Monster interface for collision detection and basic game mechanics. This monster has position, dimensions, and behavior suitable for collision testing.
Version:
1.0
Author:
DLB Team
